author: Lukas I. Alpert
title: News Corp Revenue Lifted by Real Estate and Book Units
text:
News Corp posted a 6% gain in revenue for the March quarter, driven by strong results at its digital-real-estate and book-publishing units and the positive impact of foreign-currency fluctuations.
At the companyâ€™s news and information-services business, which accounts for just under two-thirds of its top line, revenue rose 2% compared with the year-earlier quarter.
